member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket

summary.vsli:raw: Provides a client for connecting to WebSocket services.

member.summary: 提供用于连接到 WebSocket 服务的客户端。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket" /> class.

member.summary: 创建 类的实例。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.Abort

summary.vsli:raw: Aborts the connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

member.summary: 中止连接并取消任何挂起的 IO 操作。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseAsync(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Close the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket" /> instance as an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: 关闭 实例以作为异步操作。

param.name: closeStatus
param.vsli:raw: The WebSocket close status.

member.param: WebSocket 关闭状态。

param.name: statusDescription
param.vsli:raw: A description of the close status.

member.param: 关闭状态的说明。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.

member.param: 一个取消标记，用于传播应取消此操作的通知。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

member.summary: 关闭 的输出以作为异步操作。

param.vsli:raw: The WebSocket close status.

member.param: WebSocket 关闭状态。

param.name: statusDescription

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.

member.param: 一个取消标记，用于传播应取消此操作的通知。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseStatus

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the reason why the close handshake was initiated on <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket" /> instance.

member.summary: 获取指示在 实例上启动关闭握手的原因。

returns.vsli:raw: The reason why the close handshake was initiated.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseStatusDescription

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a description of the reason why the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket" /> instance was closed.

member.summary: 获取对 实例关闭的原因的说明。

returns.vsli:raw: The description of the reason why the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket" /> instance was closed.

member.returns: 对 实例关闭的原因的说明。

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync(System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.vsli:raw: Connects to a WebSocket server as an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: 连接到 WebSocket 服务器以作为异步操作。

param.name: uri
param.vsli:raw: The URI of the WebSocket server to connect to.

member.param: 要连接到的 WebSocket 服务器的 URI。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that the operation should be canceled.

member.param: 可用于传播应取消操作的通知的取消标记。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

summary.vsli:raw: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket" /> instance.

member.summary: 释放 实例使用的非托管资源。

param.vsli:raw: The buffer containing the message to be sent.

param.vsli:raw: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the buffer is clear text or in a binary format.

param.name: endOfMessage
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to indicate this is the final asynchronous send; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.param: 要指示这是最终异步发送，则为 ；否则为 。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.

member.param: 可用于传播应取消此操作的通知的取消标记。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

param.vsli:raw: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the buffer is clear text or in a binary format.

param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to indicate this is the final asynchronous send; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.param: 要指示这是最终异步发送，则为 ；否则为 。

param.name: cancellationToken
param.vsli:raw: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.

member.param: 可用于传播应取消此操作的通知的取消标记。

returns.vsli:raw: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocketOptions.UseDefaultCredentials

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates if default credentials should be used during WebSocket handshake.

member.summary: 获取或设置一个 值，它指示是否应在 WebSocket 握手期间使用默认凭据。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if default credentials should be used during WebSocket handshake; otherwise, <see langword="false" />. The default is <see langword="true" />.

member.returns: 如果应在 WebSocket 握手期间使用默认凭据, 则为;否则为。 默认值为 。
